tool_description: Validates analytical data quality by checking precision, accuracy, and compliance with laboratory standards using control samples, duplicates, and reference materials.

sample_data.description: Array of sample IDs to validate

control_sample_ids.description: Reference standard sample IDs used in the batch

acceptable_rsd_percent.description: Maximum acceptable relative standard deviation percentage

bias_tolerance_percent.description: Maximum acceptable bias from certified values

error_messages: Insufficient data: At least one sample and one control sample are required.
Control samples not found: One or more control sample IDs do not exist.
Invalid tolerance values: RSD and bias tolerances must be positive numbers between 0.1 and 50.
No analytical data: Samples must have completed analytical data before validation.
usage: Provide sample_data array and control_sample_ids; optionally set acceptable_rsd_percent and bias_tolerance_percent. The tool evaluates data quality and flags any issues.

overall_batch_status.description: Overall quality status: passed, warning, or failed

precision_results.description: Precision test results for each element

accuracy_results.description: Accuracy test results for each element

flagged_samples.description: Sample IDs that failed QC criteria
